scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: Collection of collotype photographic postcards of Tonkin, or northern Vietnam, under French colonial rule. Contains 98 black-and-white postcards.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A 7.5"x5.5" album titled "Souvenir de L'Indo-Chine" containing 98 black-and-white collotype photographic postcards. Virtually all of the pages of the album have become detached from the binding. The postcards depict life in Tonkin, or northern Vietnam, especially Hanoi and surrounding areas, during French colonial rule. The date 1905 comes from an inscription in the front of the album and may not reflect the creation date of the cards themselves.
